headline: Clorox (CLX): Assessing Value After Recent 3% Pullback and Analyst Upside Potential
summary: Clorox (CLX) shares have pulled back about 3% over the past month, capturing the attention of investors who follow consumer staples stocks. The recent moves raise questions about the company’s positioning in a shifting market environment. See our latest analysis for Clorox. Clorox’s recent 3% pullback is part of a much steeper slide, as its 2024 share price return has now reached -26%. While short-term momentum has faded and concerns about shifting consumer demand persist, the longer-term...
